main event: Coast Guardsmen reported sighting two oval discs connected by a strut flying in Peril Strait, Alaska on 8 July 1950.
interesting points: The objects were observed flying at an altitude of 15,000 feet,The discs appeared opaque white in color,The estimated speed of the objects was 350 kph, The sighting lasted for approximately 2.5 minutes, One photograph showing the side view of the ship is included in the report
sighted object: two oval discs connected by a strut
witness description: Members of the U.S. Coast Guard aboard CCG Hemlock (WAGL-217) in Ketchikan, Alaska
